questions.question_text: An organization has implemented a system capable of comprehensive employee monitoring. Which of the following should direct how the system is used?

choices.B: the jurisdiction in which an organization has its principal headquarters.
choices.C: international law and a uniform set of regulations.
choices.A: the laws and regulations of each individual country.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Agree it is A.

Selected Answer: A
While there are efforts to establish international regulations governing data privacy, cybersecurity, and other aspects of online business, the current legal and regulatory environment is characterized by a patchwork of national and regional regulations.
